title: Analysis of land-use and livelihood transformations in peri-urban areas: Insights from North-Western Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Alfred Toku, Samuel Twumasi Amoah, Nelson Nyabanyi N-yanbini, Anthony Kwabena Sarfo, Prosper Tornyeviadzi
